SEARCH
Package gw.cc.claim.archiving.entity

Interface ClaimInfo

All Superinterfaces:
com.guidewire.cc.domain.purging.Purgeable
public interface ClaimInfo extends com.guidewire.cc.domain.purging.Purgeable
ClaimInfo Denormalized data for a certain claim graph. This is to be used to retrieve information about a claim regardless of whether it is archived or not.

    • getClaimCurrency

      @Nullable Currency getClaimCurrency()
      Get the claim currency. For a live claim this will return the corresponding claim's currency. For an archived claim it will return the value in this info's Currency field. For claims archived in 8.0 or later this field will have been populated when the claim was archived. For earlier archived claims the field will be null, indicating that we don't know the currency of the archived claim.
      Returns:
      possibly null currency. If null then we cannot determine the currency of the claim

    • optInArchivedClaimToMarkPurgeReady

      void optInArchivedClaimToMarkPurgeReady(String purgeReason)
      This adds the supplied purgeReason to the current ExecutionSession under key 'archivedclaimreasontopurge' This should only be called within the config/rules/Purge/ArchivedClaimPurge rules
      Parameters:
      purgeReason - the reason to purge this claim
